Title.evidence: Title: Randomised Controlled Trial on Blood Transfusion in Total Knee Replacement

Trial_Design.evidence: This retrospective cross-sectional study was conducted at Hospital Melaka

Participants.evidence: Eligibility criteria included primary knee osteoarthritis and unilateral TKR.

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to assess the prevalence of ABT and factors influencing transfusion and blood loss.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the prevalence of ABT, measured postoperatively.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The prevalence of ABT was 4.39% (95% CI 2.04, 6.74).

Trial_Registration.evidence: The study was not registered as a trial
